attributes.action: RESIGN ALL POWERS, WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT....YES YOU MR BROWN!!!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned, demand that the Prime minister is removed from office imediately, before he can do even greater damage to this country. If your trying to make a better life for your family, trying to move to better boroughs, trying to put money by for retirement, then this man is not for you. lets get this man out before he taxes us to death or starts a cold war with russia

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
